feed.title: Gianni Coene
feed.subtitle: Portfolio Website listing important skills, created projects and practical information.

entry.title: Current progress on the website
entry.content:
Hello, just a quick update about the website. As you can see it is currently still under construction.

I’ll add working buttons and links as soon as possible.

Issues:

  • Not all projects have a github page or link.
entry.summary: Just a quick heads up that the website is still under construction and not every button/link will work.

entry.title: Fosdem 2018
entry.content:
Fosdem 2018

I will be attending Fosdem 2018 in Brussels. Fosdem is a convention all about Open Source.

Fosdem starts 3th of February and ends on the 4th of February.

Fosdem features lots of developers all interested in Open Source. You will be able to attend workshops and presentations.

For more information see: the Fosdem website
entry.summary: Short announcement that I will be attending Fosdem 2018 in Brussels. Fosdem is an Open Source convention in Brussels.

entry.title: Welcome
entry.content:
Welcome to my blog!

This is my very first post. You an see this post as a welcome message or a testing of sorts.

Please stay tuned for more posts. I’ll try to regularly make a post on here.

See you around!
entry.summary: This is my very first post. This won't be about IT, this is more of a welcome message for everyone to see ;).
